TopicTitle: How to temporarily disable or uninstall Breaking Ground?

Articles.Content: My potato machine is struggling.  I want to disable/uninstall Breaking Ground to see if it helps

4 hours ago, darthgently said:

My potato machine is struggling.  I want to disable/uninstall Breaking Ground to see if it helps

Open your GameData/SquadExpansion folder

Then move the Serenity folder somewhere outside GameDate (Desktop or some other place where you can find again ...)

Just tried and it didn't seem to leave any nasty side effects, unless you have crafts using parts from Breaking Grounds  that is.

 

Edited August 17, 2022 by Curveball Anders
Realized that others can use the answer ...
